Introducing Komodo - Your Ultimate Screen Recording Tool

â€œI love Komodo's video + guide and guide-only features on top of the video recording feature. It's particularly useful when writing step-by-step guides and SOPs.â€ - AppSumo User warp214

Collaborate Seamlessly with Teams: Komodo's "Spaces" feature allows you to group teams together, facilitating seamless collaboration. Built-in annotation and commenting make it easy for teams to work together and provide feedback effectively.

â€œThis software solves many of the problems of screen recording. I use Cloudapp and many times when I made mistakes I used not bother editing but instead created the same video again. It works for short videos, but when your video is longer, Komodo will cover me up.â€ - AppSumo User Camilo

A Streamlined Experience: Komodo has been designed from the ground up to be intuitive and non-intrusive. It aims to simplify the recording process, allowing you to effortlessly share your work with others.

Take your screen recording to the next level with Komodo. Record, collaborate, and share like never before. Try it today and experience the difference!
long.ca,de,es,fr,hi,it,pl,ru:
Video capture for productivity. 

Want to share a product demo? Or a project update? Or a UX review? Komodo makes this easy to do with fast and shareable video recordings right from Chrome. 

Want to understand how your users are watching your videos? Get real-time analytics as well as a daily summary of exactly how much of your work gets consumed. 

Want to collaborate with teams? Komodo is built for that by grouping teams in a concept we call "Spaces" and allowing built-in annotation and commenting. Our teams love using it and hope you love it too! 

Komodo has been built from the ground up to get out of the way. It aims to simplify the recording experience to share your work with others.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,fa,fi,fil:
Introducing Komodo - Your Ultimate Screen Recording Tool

Komodo is much more than a screen recording tool. It offers 
 - Full Screen Recording 
 - SOP (Guides) Automatic Creation 
 - Cloud Editor - Easily and quickly edit your videos 
 - Page Builder - Build websites out of your video to enhance presence & context
